---
title: "Midterm Momentum"
subtitle: "Optional Subtitle Providing Additional Context"
author: 
  - name: "Lowell Monis"
  - affiliation: "Michigan State University"
  - email: "monislow@msu.edu"

date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
# date: "2024-03-24"  # Alternative: Manually specify date

output:
  html_document:
    theme: "readable"  # Choose from default themes like default, cerulean, journal, flatly, readable, spacelab, united, cosmo, lumen, paper, sandstone, simplex, yeti
    highlight: "tango"  # Code syntax highlighting style (default, tango, pygments, kate, monochrome, espresso, zenburn, haddock, breezedark, textmate)
    
    # Layout and Formatting
    toc: true  # Table of Contents
    toc_depth: 3  # Depth of headers to include in TOC
    toc_float: 
      collapsed: false  # Makes TOC float alongside content
      smooth_scroll: true  # Smooth scrolling to TOC sections
    
    # Code Handling
    code_folding: "show"  # Options: "none", "show", "hide"
    code_download: true  # Adds a download button for R code
    
    # Additional Rendering Options
    self_contained: true  # Creates a single HTML file with all dependencies
    number_sections: false  # Adds numeric prefixes to sections
    df_print: "paged"  # How data frames are printed (paged, default, tibble)

# Bibliography and Citations (Optional)
#bibliography: references.bib  # Path to your BibTeX file
#csl: apa.csl  # Citation Style Language file

# Advanced Customization
params:
  version: 1.0
# data_source: "path/to/data"

# Supplementary Metadata
tags: 
  - "data-science"
  - "r-markdown"
  - "blogging"

keywords:
  - "reproducible research"
  - "data visualization"
---
